name: First Team Pilot Training
about: First Team Pilot Training is a premier flight school serving the greater Memphis, TN area, operating from West Memphis Airport (KAWM) and Fayette County Airport (KFYE). We offer comprehensive flight and ground instruction in well-equipped Piper Cherokee aircraft, tailored to each student's unique learning style and schedule. Our courses include Private Pilot, Sport Pilot, Instrument Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Flight Instructor certifications. With a focus on professionalism and safety, our training programs are designed by experienced instructors, including a Senior Flight Instructor with 30 years of civilian and military training experience. We aim to produce confident, safe, and world-class pilots, ensuring they are well-prepared for successful careers in aviation. Our inclusive atmosphere and commitment to excellence make us a top choice for aspiring pilots.
